website_summaries.verdict: For all the bells and whistles, this unit fits the bill — and provides location updates up to every 10 seconds at no additional cost.
pros: Easy setup, a long battery life, and tracking history for up to a year
It works not only in the US, but also in several countries worldwide
Monthly cost is a flat $25 regardless of plan, with a discount for multiple months
cons: Battery can fluctuate and be drained quickly if set incorrectly
some users report the website can be confusing

customer_reviews.title: Heart Attack False reading
customer_reviews.text: Really hate to leave bad reviews for anything. This GPS unit witch has seemed to work fairly well Just somehow gave us a false reading. We keep this unit in our child's backpack. From time to time I check the location. Well to my surprise the units location was smack dab in the local emergency room. Checked the history and the movement would appear that the unit traveled directly from the school to the hospital. Well after frantically calling the school it turned out the kid and GPS unit were all still located at the school. Thank you Americaloc for the 20 minutes of sure terror.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I found why my husband changed so ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can tell you that what ever they Say it will do it does it. Great product. I found why my husband changed so much with me! Being Cheated is the worst part of a relationship. Good luck and be prepared to find out what are you looking for. If you think and your heart feels it. It's certainly true you just need a little be of help and this little guy will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Life is beautiful

customer_reviews.title: I have never given 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did A LOT of research before purchasing this device. It is without question the best for the money. You can get cheaper units without sim cards and deal with all of that yourself but if you want plug and play, this is it! Cons: The online software and phone app GUI is outdated. (But it is functional and gives you all the information you need) It does take some getting used to. Pros: The email support is fast and easy and very willing to help!! I am not easily impressed but I have to give credit where it's due. Highly Recommended from someone who is Highly Critical.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS Tracker
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. I hardwired one to a car that was being transported when we moved from Minnesota to Colorado. I put another one in a box that was packed with the moving company. I was able to track both all the way. The battery on the one packed lasted 8 days before it died. That was one more day than it took for the move.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua lvr

customer_reviews.title: Great tracking device.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Battery life is basically what the advertise. When vehicle is idle remember to deselect the speed function. This aides in longevity of the battery. The magnetic case works great for those looking for one. VERY strong magnet
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning unit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The unit I have is currently malfunctioning. Its reporting all sorts of false information. Wrong location, movement when no movement is happening, VERY EXTREMELY delayed information...this particular device has got to be defective. I hope that the company will make good on this expensive purchase and stop giving me a song and a dance about all of the wrong information its reporting and just replace this malfunctioning unit with one that is brand new and actually is working. IF that does happen AND the replacement actually works properly, I'll updatethis review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: travelgirl

customer_reviews.title: had to contact bank to keep them from my account
customer_reviews.text: The tracker was in use for about two years. I cannot evaluate its performance during that period as I had a faulty internet connection. Recently I asked to discontinue service. Although I gave them all information regarding the device, such as account number and login, they refused to discontinue charges because I had a new web address. I had to contact my bank to keep them from accessing my account.
customer_reviews.author: Don T

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: Purchase 2 devices to track a expensive piece of equipment that I shipped from Nashville TN to San Francisco California . Both devises were easy to setup and worked well for the first day. Once the freight stopped over night I could no longer get any updates on location . The freight has since arrived in San Francisco and still I cannot get a updated GPS location . The tech department informed me that there must not be any cell service from Kansas City ,the last known location to San Francisco were currently is now .
customer_reviews.author: Nickg

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product in that it works so well. Way more accurate than I expected. I had a little trouble initially but the support team helped me figure it out very quickly. If your looking for a tracking device I highly recommend this particular one/company. I also bought the magnetic case to put it in which also worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: brett mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great tracker
customer_reviews.text: Get the magnet case for under the car. Let me know exactly what my girl was up to. If you are financially invested in the relationship in anyway and you suspect cheating, it’s your right to know the truth. It sucked but it made me feel much better knowing who she really was. Check local laws and make sure u really want to know
customer_reviews.author: Verle

customer_reviews.title: The most low-cost and accurate tracker I have ever used 100% love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tracking device uses two different cell phone companies to tracking device anywhere from 10 seconds 30 minutes to hours very accurate mapping on the app very happy with everything except I wish it had altitude, it has longitude and latitude and bearing and battery percentages, and speed alarm and email panic button, highly accurate very small footprint I use it for my service dog on his color as well on my drone to track fly aways, not short range bluetooth, but LONG RANGE, ACCURATE, thanks so much for this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: scott petersen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very accurate and the promotional 3 months of monitoring for $25 is a great value. I was able to "monitor" my 20 year old while borrowing my 350z and after 2 weeks, just called him and asked for him to return my car as it was not being used as agreed.
customer_reviews.author: mark wertz

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy, and Effective - Stop wondering and get the Truth!!
customer_reviews.text: Personally used this device to catch a cheating/lying spouse. It's all about piece of mind - you don't have to guess or be lied to anymore this provides the truth. Awesome device. You can also change the frequency of updates in the app in real time. Battery life is great - in normal to cold temps a single charge lasts about two weeks, when it got into the negatives the battery seemed to go a little faster.
customer_reviews.author: Dinglehoots

customer_reviews.title: Incredible bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tracker for my small motorcycle. I’m always paranoid that it’ll get stolen while I’m working when I leave it outside. I downloaded the app and it’s very simple and easy to use. When I leave my bike in my house i set the gps updates to the longest intervals, when I ride it to work or out in general I set it to update every 2 mins. In the event that it’d get stolen I would set it to update every 10 secs. I willfully charged the battery at 27% a bit after 3 weeks. The details it gives you in the updates is awesome, I’m almost hoping my bike gets stolen....
customer_reviews.author: B&M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. It did the job. I caught my husband cheating. exact address Of the building. I love it. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough to justify purchasing.  Tech support is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial activation, the unit worked quite well. Everything as advertised. About a month in though, the unit would start to lose track in areas it previously tracked perfectly. Contacted tech support and either they didn’t grasp my expectations or just chose to give advice that obviously covered their rear. They explained the “cold start” which I was already aware of and wasn’t a problem, the suggested I watch the video on unit placement which I already had. I guess the unit placement only matters when there are no issues with tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Battery won’t take a charge!! Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible!! It only charged once and now doesn’t work at all. My “return” time past just two weeks ago and I only had this product for 1 month!! When it was working, it worked fine, but now it’s worthless since I can’t charge it back up! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fitswell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my review. My tracker worked great until the charging port broke. After mentioning it in my review, I had an email from them the next day stating there is a 1 year warranty and asking for an address to send a new one to. Customer service like that is hard to beat, and I know things sometimes happen, so I'm changing my rating to reflect that. It would sometimes go days without updating, I'm assuming because of a lack of movement, but was pretty accurate when it did. Definitely gives me peace of mine that I could recover my ATV if it gets stolen like my last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Travis798

customer_reviews.title: Broke  within a month
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my wife for a trip to Mexico and Quit charging within a month. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J Welch

customer_reviews.title: It picks up a signal just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I installed the app on my phone. The app informs me of the battery life. I usually have to charge it every 10 to 12 days. I have the tracking device installed in a magnetic case behind my rear bumper. It picks up a signal just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DHR

customer_reviews.title: Modern Technology GPS Tracker and Superior Support Team
customer_reviews.text: This tracking device does what it says and the service is outstanding. I've done some engineering testing; the battery life and location accuracy is excellent. I did get another device (different brand) a few months back it didn't meet published expectations and definitely didn't meet the support teams claims. The accuracy was very bad and I couldn't believe the hard sell that I was getting. This device is excellent and is the real thing, modern technology, uses all carrires - picks one based on coverage, very accurate tracking, and super fast support. I highly recommend Americaloc !!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike01886

customer_reviews.title: The best GPS Device I own
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to track my boat when it is docked overnight or left at the repair shop on a trailer. It works great. Battery life is great, its accurate, and portable. I have it set to alert me if the device moves. As soon as the boat moves I get a text. I can get on my iphone app and check the location, watch history, change alert settings, etc. Very easy to do. I contacted tech support with a question and the emailed back almost immediately. Then, a few days later, they emailed me back to make sure all was well and to see if I had any other questions. I'll be buying another for work very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Extra Monthly charges
customer_reviews.text: Did not activate when it mentioned more money needed. I searched for a gps with no extra fee. Nowhere did they mention a fee for tracking.. I think this is dishonest. AT LEAST INCLUDE THE FIST MONTH FREE (OR INCLUDED). I CONSIDER THIS DISHONEST.
customer_reviews.author: Ei_monen

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong if you buy it !
customer_reviews.text: This device really works. I did my home work before purchasing it . I normally don’t give reviews, but because I purchase it to track my teenage son activities and I can say it’s well worth it. Buy it you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: William White

customer_reviews.title: POOR CUSTOMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: The GPS server for this product is very very difficult to understand. Much more confusing than spy tech. No customer service number to obtain helpful guidance. Email support is weak. Provides links to confusing instructions, FAQs don't address what to do if your tracker is not receiving data. So sorry, I will be returning my device simply because of the poor GPS server.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: He can turn off his phone but I can still find him with this and it gives me great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Really simple. This thing rocks. I have a new driver with girlfriend issues. He can turn off his phone but I can still find him with this and it gives me great peace of mind. Don't recommend that you spy on your child but for a new driver this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mudry

customer_reviews.title: Track the bike
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Have it on my motorcycle with magnetic case. Only thing not apparent in instructions is when you get, plug in to charge and leave for a day. It will then be visible online and not immediately even though you register it on website. The on off button is finicky and have to find right spot to push to cut off, but that's only grip. Customer service very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Company is great - really responsive
customer_reviews.text: Company is great - really responsive. Unfortunately, the GPS stops charging - something is wrong w/ the connection port. We're on our third GPS in about as many months.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kadlub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service .. caution about battery life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and service but the battery life does not last as long as advertised when exact tracking is required. Not having access to the device for recharging, I have discontinued the service. Paid extra for the expectation of battery life but did not meet my requirements!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: perfect to catch a thief.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these now, i have been using the first one for a few months now and it has performed flawlessly. The battery lasts a couple of weeks but i charge it when it gets to about 30% just in case. I am going to use the second one to catch a theif that has been burglarizing cars at my lot it is small enough to fit inside iirresistible electronics and is accurate enough to pinpoint a specific house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This product really works well. I used it to track my luggage when I went abroad. The battery typically last 3-4 days before having to charge. It can pinpoint your location very well and easy to use. The customer service is great. You do have to pay about $25 a month for service, but it's worth it if your traveling or need to keep track of something. Its pricey, but compared to other brands out there, this had great reviews about actually working and being reliable. This is why I bought it and the reviews were correct.
customer_reviews.author: ig

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could use more initial explanation
customer_reviews.text: A little complicated to figure out. Instructions are clear but could use more explanation of how to navigate the device. I called the Help Line once and they were okay. I figured it out eventually but it took some trial and error. As far as the utility of it, it works well. . Kind of unnerving to be tracking my teenage son but very grateful to have been abel to see what he was doing. It helped me to move forward in how to handle a very detrimental situation that would be going on for far longer without the real information about where they were going. Battery stays much longer when you extend the frequency past 80 seconds...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Battery power
customer_reviews.text: I cant seem to ever charge it. It sat for 24hrs and never gets charged. It always says 65%. Never changes. I dont know when it will die ****update talking to them by email is SUPER easy and they respond fast. They think when I rebooted it, it just got stuck. Charged another 8 hrs and it functioned back to new. It really works well, wish I had more.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: It works but I would try something else.
customer_reviews.text: It's works pretty decent just has bad interface for website and can be confusing when try to see all the places in a day with the time line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly priced. Great service. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is perfectly sized, and clearly built to be reasonably resistant to moisture and abuse. The support provided by Americaloc is excellent and once I figured out how to place the unit and understanding how it all works, it is awesome and completely suits my needs, which came down to some extra security for my father’s car.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Accurate GPS, expensive, and poor UI
customer_reviews.text: Good product, accurate GPS, but the UI is painful and not a great value ($100 + $25 monthly). The notification setting is not the smartest - in addition to on/off times, wish there was a simple swipe activate option. The map almost never re-centers automatically and is always in satellite mode by default.
customer_reviews.author: Tegi

customer_reviews.title: Worked liked a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This little fella really does work! I had some trouble setting it up and tech support was excellent on getting me on track. Long battery life. Spot on GPS. Love the ability to sync with Google maps. Look no further if you need a tracker this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Website and app are fine after using it for a few minutes to get it all figured out. GPS is very accurate. I was able to catch my husband cheating on me by placing this under his vehicle seat. Led me right to his location. I highly recommend this product- it’s a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Betty H

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you want to track something valuable to you.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other GPS similar to this one, what puts this one above the rest is it has motion detection and notifications which is what I needed and was looking for because this will be added to a bike, if someone attempts to steal bike, I will be notified via phone text message so that I can stop and or track where my bike is. Customer service also has a good response time to my questions and concerns. A must have if you want to track something valuable to you.
customer_reviews.author: Bxbobby

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm only updating every 2 minutes because I don't need 10 or 20 second info. The battery had 26% after two weeks with these settings. So far, have had no issues with the unit staying connected to the cellular service and was able to easily figure out the web interface. Only thing I'd say is the reporting capabilities are capable, but basic. More than sufficient for my needs, but I'm used to working with commercial GPS systems that have very capable reporting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer with One of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful for this device and service. I had grown anxious regarding my 90 y/o Mom's memory while driving. She only goes to very familiar places, i.e., church, hair stylist, grocery shopping. I needed assurance that she had reached these destinations and returned home safely. This device and service have provided me with such accuracy ... I am relieved to know where she has driven. Before deciding on this device, I researched devices such as this. It was reported as one of the best. I am very satisfied that it is.
customer_reviews.author: ahcan

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Even Better Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I feel that I’ve truly put mine to the test; sub artic temperatures, long periods of time before charges, exposure to condensation—it’s made it through it all. Excellent customer service, I’ve had numerous agents reach out to me to make sure my product is working as expected and offering personal customizations for my specific need. Can’t recommend AmericaLoc enough. If you’re in the business of tracking this is a product you want to invest in.
customer_reviews.author: MCCJC

customer_reviews.title: Caught the Cheater!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed to do; lead me right to the location of my husband’s side chic. The timing And location were both accurate. Highly recommended if you’re ready to prove your suspicions are correct about your cheating spouse. Next step divorce.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself seems to beA solid product,HoweverThe program is very cumbersome to use and not very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Best Vehicle Tracking Device - AMERICALOG GL 300W
customer_reviews.text: I Love GL300W tracker unit. You can place the device almost anywhere in your vehicle per Americaloc instructions. I’ve never had a problem tracking our family vehicle from start to finish. The map is clear and identifiable at street level and extremely easy to use. The company (AMERICALOG) that sells the product is Very helpful when you call them and ensures your questions are answered to your satisfaction. The checkout many companies that sell vehicle tracking devices and AMERICALOG is the Best on the market today with its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grate product and grate custumer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very acurate pin pointing location. And best of all , the best customer service I ever had . Not that I have any issues with the product or service , the company really stand behind their product. I won't hasitate to do business with them in the future. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TECH PLUS

customer_reviews.title: Second Review
customer_reviews.text: I already wrote a review a few years ago regarding the devise itself, which is very good. But I wanted to acknowledge just how good the customer support is. Great customer support seems more rare than ever but these guys are on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tappie

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true. Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best as far as accuracy, reliability, durability, dependability, and affordability. The service subscription is a real value as to pricing. So easy to set up and use. Very helpful tracking a cheating partner and teenage drivers. I have another highly rated tracker-this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: TRK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and 100% visibility
customer_reviews.text: Activation was very easy and I got a great deal, pay for 4 months and got 3 free. The first time through the instructions of how to charge and use didn't make sense to me (but that was just me). After a few times tracking my older parent on the website I felt like a pro. The zones were the greatest idea ever. I get an email every time the car leaves and reenters the safe zone. We live in a rural area and have 100% tracking visibility. I now feel so much more confident about leaving my parent alone for several days at a time. Because I placed the device inside the car, I can't rate the waterproof actualities.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy and Effective to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this GPS Tracker it's even better with the hardwired system. Cost me less than 20 bucks a month to operate. And I know the exact location my equipment is in when I rent it out. I'm thinking about getting a couple more. Plus they're nice because you can literally hide them in your child's backpack to keep tabs on em.
customer_reviews.author: jd mills

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I liked everything about it . I’ve Never used a more accurate product than this one . It was so simple that I thought there was no way it could be this easy and work this well but it was all of that . I’m so use to the products I order never being what they say they are and I didn’t expect this one to be as good as it is. I can’t think of one thing I could say wrong about it . Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well in cold
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on my own vehicle on, Starting off it worked great, updated to my exact location. 1 day later it was down to 80 percent And worked perfectly fine, did my exact locations still. The 2nd day, it was down to 33 percent. However, on the 2nd day, the device wasn’t updating my exact locations. In fact, it was about a block off from where I was at, and sometimes it wasn’t updating at all. Now on both days it was about 20 degrees and at night it dropped to about 5 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: High quality product & excellent costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the product, very accurate, easy to use & battery last long time too. I wish to add an extra star for the company costumer care a services. They're always helpful, doesn't matter how small issue is. Additionally, they went out of their way & promptly replaced my current device that was accidentally damaged, even the warranty didn't cover this particular accident. 6 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar K.

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal! The Customer support is very helpful!! There are no hidden fees. You do have to pay a monthly fee, you get a great deal on the monthly rates. But there up front about being charged a monthly fee. The battery life last about 12 days. This is very easy to read. This is not a knock off product.
customer_reviews.author: Mcelloman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tracking device!
customer_reviews.text: My GL300W tracker from Americaloc does exactly what I want it to do: keep track of teenage drivers! It gives very accurate location readings and does a good job of monitoring speed (although this requires battery recharging more often). The two times I’ve called customer service, the agents have been very patient and thorough in answering my questions. The job it does is well worth the price compared to another cheaper brand that I had tried previously.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Richter

customer_reviews.title: Best choice out there
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this gps for a month now and I very happy with it. The battery lasted two weeks on its first run and I was pleasantly surprised by that. I’didnt expect it to last that long. It’s nice to be able to adjust parameters from your phone... this is real help in saving battery life. The app is adequate but needs to be updated with more helpful user interfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Norm C

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind comes in a Small Portable Package
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this small tracker for about a month now, to keep track of my car. I'm very impressed with the accuracy and sensitivity of motion. I'm a collector of cars, but can only drive one at a time, so rather than buying different permanent trackers for each car, I only take this one tracker with me and hide in car. In addition, Americarloc has an AMAZING customer service with quick response to questions. I've been telling my family and friends to get one! Solid device and reputation...It brings a great peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace another tracker that was connected to my wife's car. She sometimes gets confused and lost. That one worked well except occasionally it would stop reporting for 15-20 minutes. When my wife stopped driving I got the GL300W. It's small enough to go in her purse and so far has worked perfectly - no delays. Location reporting is excellent. Set on 60 second reporting the battery lasts about a week. It is a great source of comfort to be able to know where she is. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Thompson

customer_reviews.title: World-Wide Superior Tracking Service!
customer_reviews.text: I travel extensively throughout Europe and this thing works great! I place the tracker in my luggage when I have to check it in. Using this service along with the phone app, you can see exactly where your luggage is! Additionally, the Ameriloc support team is absolutely fantastic! 110% recommend this product and service if you need to track something. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Aarnio

customer_reviews.title: Great gps, a real peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I check up on my boat daily on my phone and laptop. This GPS device is where its at. I'd suggest this to anyone that wants an update on the location of an expensive item/toy that is stored away from home. One of the best purchases on Amazon I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Flava-Flav-Family

customer_reviews.title: GPS with its own Power Source
customer_reviews.text: - Tracking device gives you general location when the wireless signal is strong. If it is week, the accuracy is not that good. - No application available - Loose signal frequently - Battery life does not last as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great to track equipment!!
customer_reviews.text: Works mint. IOS app is a little clunky but overall it works. Paid for a year of service and it’s been pretty reliable. Can track exactly where my equipment is at any given point in time. It’s small enough to hide, about the size of half a snickers candybar.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & accurate device with amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and even better customer service! I am so happy with the purchase! I highly recommend to anyone that needs a reliable gps. Well worth my money because it puts my mind at ease. It is so accurate it even shows you what side of the street you’re on. No need to look elsewhere, this is the only device you’ll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Tsaylor

customer_reviews.title: WHY DID I WAIT
customer_reviews.text: I have been dating a man that was increasingly unavailable and spending time out of town. I inevitably became suspicious. After researching the best tracking devices, I decided upon this one. The first day I put the tracker in his vehicle, he was lying to me about his whereabouts and tracked him to his girlfriend's home. I appreciated this tracker confirming what I suspected all along. Don't hesitate to buy this. It is more expensive but definitely worth the investment for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Inmysmallcorneroftheworld

customer_reviews.title: very good product!
customer_reviews.text: had it over a month.. very nice product.. seems like it updates every 2 mins when vehicle is in motion.. or 1 to 2 hours when vehicle is parked.. as soon as u start moving it updates every 2 mins i guess to save battery life.. battery lasted me 3 weeks! i will buy 4 more of these units.. one for my harley-davidson, one for my small 5x8 tractor supply trailer, one for my boat.. and other things such as vehicles.. if something gets stolen.. ill find it easy.. very good product worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tracker with long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a great unit. Fast to recharge, holds a good long charge, the app is easy to use as well! I would recommend this to anyone that needs to track something moving or stationary
customer_reviews.author: ProHost Entertainment

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use. Caught my guy lieing to me just like i suspected. Bye bye loser Definitely worth the price. Loved the map tells you road by road, time, so darn simple. You gotta charge it for 8 hours before using, so dont buy this thinking your going to use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The GL300W is the real deal and fantastic. Would highly recommend this product. I did a lot of research before purchase and happy with my choice as I am confident this is truly one of the best. Works exactly as advertised and extremely accurate gps location. Battery life is incredible and lasts over two weeks on right setting. Americaloc web interface is easy to use and shows detailed map of location. You won't be dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I Paid Full Price, No Discount Or Freebies
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the yearly cost are great. I got a new Military K-9 and this fits on her collar, so I always know where see is. Works great with a 5 year old who thinks he can go any where at anytime. I'm to old for casing 6 year olds. BTW this company as excellent customer service, they had me after the first E-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Ursu "DaBear"s Arctos

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this GPS, it’s worth buying it. You can easily access information through their app or website. GPS would track every minute. At first I thought that sucked but at the end it still gave the results I expected. I actually bought two of them on seperate ocassions. I also bought a mini magnetic case for it which fit perfect for it. Highly recommend this item! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: First I purchased the land sea air 54 which is seriously a joke!! But this tracker gl300 is spot on. The accuracy is down to about 6ft and never loses signal . Very simple to use , I had no prior experience with trackers before this. I would buy again and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I've been recharging the battery every 2-3 weeks and that seems to work fine. The tracking info is very detailed
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal. Works flawlessly. Compact and inconspicuous. Plug and play right out of the box. No problem with signal strength or battery life. I've been recharging the battery every 2-3 weeks and that seems to work fine. The tracking info is very detailed. In my case, I can see my car's route, speed, starts and stops. Excellent customer service as I needed to contact the company. Very helpful and accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn2155

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product but off by a few feet.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a classic car. this is awesome and easy to set up. Reason why I did not give 5 stars is because it is off about 50-100 ft. I have my car parked inside my garage and the satellite say it’s in my 2 houses neighbor’s garage. If someone stole my car, we would kick the wrong door to bust in and that would be embarrassing. Ha ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong here! This thing is accurate as can be, even hidden very well on a car still had great reception and extreme accuracy, saved me many more years of trouble with a cheating spouse! Would recommend 100% get the hardwire kit if you want to use this permanently, battery lasted nearly two weeks on a charge, but for theft protection of a vehicle, the hardwire is a must! Best purchase I’ve ever made period.
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great but battery doesn't last no 14 days. It's more like 3_4 days which is inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Technology!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable!! Excellent technology, dependable and precise. The GPS is completely all encompassing. You can use the website application or Smart Phone App to monitor your subjects. The technology is superb; I appreciate an opportunity to monitor loved ones in a very discreet manner. Buying their magnetic case adds security that you will not lose the device. The annual service fee is completely reasonable. Buy this product; you will be amazed at what it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Note
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Depending on the driving habits, you might want to consider hard wiring the unit to eliminate the frequent recharging. The unit does not include the hardwire cable as it is available to purchase separately.
customer_reviews.author: Critic916

customer_reviews.title: Ameriloc Tracker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tracker for my daughter as she lost her previous tracker. I like that you can pin point where the person is located and see it on a map similar to Google Maps. This tracker also has amazing battery life, i left it in my daughters backpack for 5 days and it was still transmitting. The only thing I wish was that it was a bit smaller so it would fit in my daughter pocket. It also will not update if it does not sense movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with performance of this tracker
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with performance of this tracker. Reliable. Easy to use. It does require the purchase of a plan but it is paid in advance therefore no issue with cancellation. Spoke directly with customer service rep... no issues with support. Although I am editing hours after leaving this review....the battery life indicator was at 44% and the tracker stopped transmitting. Turned out the battery was dead
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Device
customer_reviews.text: I'm waiting on the Monster Magnetic Waterproof case before attaching it to a vehicle,but it seems to be working as I expected. I was a little confused about the picture showing two devices, but only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bost

customer_reviews.title: Peace of my for only $25 a month without a long term contract.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to use and the app was simple. It is accurate to within about two parking spaces. I use it for my Harley and my wife can track me while I am on a roadtrip. Every 3 - 4 days I bring it in the hotel room to charge. What I like the best is there is no contract commitments. I only pay the $25 per month fee when I take a road trip. I dont need to have it on locally.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality, battery life, accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: I have used over 6 different gps tracking devices in the last year. The gl300w is by far the easiest to use, has the longest battery life that I have seen, over 3 weeks and still has 31% battery life, and very well built. I could have bought cheaper, but for the few dollars more, I feel that I got a lot more from this device than the others I have used. Also has excellent mapping. Paul
customer_reviews.author: paul b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and set up. Works amazing. Their service plans are excellent, you can change the refresh rate anytime for no extra money, plus several free months. I love this tracker! I looked at all of them and am so glad I went with Americaloc...I would Absolutely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: MikeG

customer_reviews.title: works great with magnetic case and quick customer service replies
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal product. Used it on my farm truck as well as show car when i take it out. At first I was having battery drainage issues but then called customer service and they did some internal tweaking on the frequency the device was on and it improved the life drastically.
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: Best device on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great product, so far it works great with very little to none issues. Battery life is as expected and great for personal use. Very easy to use web interface and mobile app. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for an affordable tracking device and service.
customer_reviews.author: Geared For Speed, Anaheim CA

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to set up and read the tracking results, and incredibly precise. I found exactly what I needed to find- a cheating partner- within one week. This will get you the answers that you have been waiting for. Trust your gut. Just be ready for what you will find. I shopped around and this was the best rated and priced product, and I see why. Completely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great value and does exactly what is promised. Battery lasts about 2 weeks on settings I’m using. Easy to review path and set up email notifications. Glad I spent a little more and choose this model.
customer_reviews.author: LiveFully

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money.!
customer_reviews.text: I used this device to track a car that I was the lienholder on. They buyers defaulted on payments and kept the car hid on personal properties till one night when they went to the movies and I snatched it! This product worked awesome and I will highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works everywhere in my car, even the trunk. Battery lasts several days. Website is easy to use, app is very user friendly. I have it hardwired under the dash behind AC/radio controls. Works with no problems. Glad I made this purchase. If you plan on using it solely for one vehicle, I would recommend a hardwire kit so you dont have to mess with the charging.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did my due diligence prior to purchasing a Vehicle GPS Tracker and this product is the best currently on the market, bar none. I don't advise you on losing your time and searching an comparing vehicle GPS trackers endlessly online, it's very simple, if you need a HIDDEN GPS tracker with real time tracking ( refreshes every 10 seconds ) then this is the one to buy. If you intend to purchase a GPS tracker for fleet management then there are more solid options than this product out there. My personal opinion, nothing more nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marlana

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product really delivers on accuracy of location. The tracking system online is amazing. The battery life is good but runs short quickly if you check the tracking often. You will have to take it out and recharge the unit often if you track often. The size of the product is a bit large to hide in easy locations if not hooked up to the car battery. Overall a great product, would recommend to anyone needing to track a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a month so far and it's great, better than I had hoped for. Easy enough to use and very detailed maps. And I believe the customer service is good- I haven't needed any but twice they've emailed me asking if I needed anything and giving me a contact name. I rarely do reviews but this exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lavena

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it for a month so far and it was worked great. I pull up the app and can always ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my motorcycle for added protection against theft. I've been using it for a month so far and it was worked great. I pull up the app and can always see where my motorcycle is. I've tested it by moving it around and driving around with it on the bike, and it is has always been accurate in terms of location. And buying the data plan was very easy too. I was able to get 2 months free with a 6 month plan purchase. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I bought this one above the others
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I bought this one above the others. It works really well. Only thing I wish it had was a more dynamic interface for mobile and an app so you didn’t have to access the website from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Charone McCann

customer_reviews.title: This ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! Live tracking and historical data, so you can telll where the car is now and where it’s been for the last 2 hours all the way to the last 7 days. The battery life is great too. I haven’t done a full test on it but my guess is it lasts for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: PlanetWaves

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good tracking device.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty easy to install and the app is also easy to understand. It would be nice if the battery charge lasted a little longer. I have mine updating positions every 80 seconds and the charge only last one week.
customer_reviews.author: Zorza

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and looong battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great tracker! Battery lasts over a week! It shuts down when no movement is detected. I use this to keep track of my 6 year old. I got a little kid size "fanny pack" for it. Marketed as an "insulin pump Carrier"
customer_reviews.author: Tom Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I just opened the box
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I just opened the box, removed the GL300 W tracker device, then went to Americaloc's website to establish an account and I was off and running. I was amazed at how easy and seamless it was to get started. No hassle or fuss!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Hallinan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use right away
customer_reviews.text: Product came nicely packaged. Very easy to set up and use right away. Tons of options allow you to set it up to meet your needs, including boundary alerts. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Foutch

customer_reviews.title: These work, not fake, do what they need to!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for securing where my classic cars are and they work as promoted. I was skeptical on reception. Mine work in glove box, in my trunk and those were my worries.... will it pickup GPS through the metal and hidden...Yes they will. Even if they go into parking garage or whatever it tells you the location just before it lost signal. It’s accurate, been testing mine for a month now. Pleased for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bott

product_meta.title: AMERICALOC GL300W Mini Portable Real Time GPS Tracker. XW Series
product_meta.description: Gps tracker. Compact and small . Use it for almost every tracking purpose: Vehicles, assets, family, employees, etc. Easy to carry in vehicles, pockets, backpacks, cases and boxes. Rechargeable battery. This gl300w is ready to work . We save 1 full year of historical data. Device will detect events as: Movement, parked, speeding, device on/off, low battery, in and out of zones, front button pressed. You may draw and configure circular and more complex custom zones. Besides capturing and saving events, the system will enable you to configure e-mail notifications for specific events. In the box: Gl300 w tracker, wall charger, sim card (installed),activation instructions. We provide an international sim card, so you can track your devices in the united states, Canada, Europe and in almost every country in the world. No contracts. No activation fees. No cancellation fees. Only pay for a plan when you need it. Note: As with all GPS receivers, it works better if there are not obstacles between it and the open sky, specially if they are made up of metal or concrete. Track your device from your computer, tablet or phone.
feature_bullets: GPS Tracker for vehicles, people, assets. New version of the famous GL300. As a welcome, Americaloc will add 2 extra months to your first service purchase. Service is USD 25 a month or even less if you buy more time. Cancel anytime

Why this one and not other version. This is the longest battery life version with extended multicarrier coverage. No activation or hidden fees. Ready to use. Beware of cheaper trackers with less battery life or less coverage. This is the new version.
Alerts: movement,parked, speeding, device on/off, low battery, entering or leaving zones, front button pressed.Battery life measured in days or even weeks, not in hours

Real Time Tracking and 1 year of tracking history. Track from any computer, tablet or phone or just download our Android and Iphone APP. Works in the US, Canada, Europe and in almost every country in the world

1 minute location updates while moving. Can be configured for location updates every 60, 30 or 10 seconds with no additional cost. This tracker is not an outdated 2G. This is the new version and it is better than a 2G

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,034 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Queclink tracker set up for Americaloc
